The fit may be the harbinger of additional legal moves in the campaign by some with the country's nearly Forty million blacks to get compensated for the struggling of their ancestors at the hands of slaveholders."The practice of captivity constituted an immoral and inhumane deprivation regarding Africans' life, liberty, African citizenship rights, cultural customs and it further starving them of the fruit of their own labor,In . the lawsuit mentioned.In a statement, Aetna said: "We do not believe a court would permit a legal case over events which usually — however regrettable — took place hundreds of years ago. These problems in no way reflect Aetna today."FleetBoston Financial did not go back a call seeking comment and CSX was out of stock. Plaintiff attorneys mentioned the suit had been the first class- action seeking slavery compensation via U.S. companies and said 12 other companies would be obtaining letters in the future requesting a conversation on a settlement. County sheriff's officials, who posted numbered pictures of the women with a department Web site in hope that the public can help you account for them.The Los Angeles Times reported any time Bradford, a photographer, was convicted in 1987 involving murdering two aspiring models, may have made a taunting statement for you to jurors deciding whether this individual should be sentenced to demise."Think of how many you do not even know about,Inches Bradford said.The photographs, many of them pornographic, were found in the mid-80s among the Bradford's possessions, CBS News correspondent Vince Gonzales reported.One of the missing women has been identified as Donnalee Campbell Duhamel, Thirty one, whose decapitated body was found in a Malibu canyon in The late seventies a few days after conference Bradford at a bar, explained sheriff's Capt. Ray Peavy."What we have listed here is a very large group of photographs of women that we are not aware of for the most part who they are,In . Peavy said. "Some of these women we ... identified; a few of them were his or her wives, ex-wives. But for the most part the majority of these folks we don't know who they are, who they were."Many of them may have likely been murder victims themselves.
